marklogic.body: Something to remember in Spring Training is that veterans or “known commodities” do not necessarily have to outperform every guy that has been invited to camp. Clearly the guys that perform the best statistically in March do not necessarily secure a Spot on the 25 man roster. It isn’t as though McClellan has never pitched well for the St. Louis Cardinals in real games, he has where Rosenthal has not…..I’m not saying Rosenthal couldn’t pitch well….veterans Always have a certain edge though.
